md:FullModel.md:Model.description: Measurement Value Source Reference data (RD) based on IEC 61970-301:2020+AMD1:2022

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Telemetered values received from a local SCADA system
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: SCADA

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Telemetered values received from a local DMS system
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: DMS

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Value received from a remote control centre via TASE.2 or other control centre protocol
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: CCLink

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Operator entered value (always manually maintained, PSR is not connected to an RTU)
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: Operator

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Value updated by a state estimator
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: Estimated

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Value updated as result of a Powerflow
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: PowerFlow

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Value that is planned or forecasted.
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: Forecasted

cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.description: Calculated from other measurement values (e.g. a sum)
cim:MeasurementValueSource.cim:IdentifiedObject.name: Calculated
